channel.title: Adam Conrad
channel.description: This is my blog and portfolio. Thanks for coming, and have a nice life.

item.title: So you've been promoted to manager. Now what?
item.description: [CDATA[ Let's explore the steps you should take to transition from individual contributor to management. ]]

item.title: Firefox Developer Edition First Impressions
item.description: [CDATA[ An in-depth breakdown of my first impressions with the Firefox Developer Edition browser. ]]

item.title: Startup vs Startup
item.description: [CDATA[ Some people think they've got a real business. Others just want to play founder on TV. ]]

item.title: Responsive Design
item.description: [CDATA[ It's still worth it, but somehow everyone hasn't done it yet. ]]

item.title: Do What You Love
item.description: [CDATA[ It's probably the most trite thing you could tell anyone. That doesn't make it any less of a true statement. ]]

item.title: Stand Out
item.description: [CDATA[ No one ever got anywhere special by blending in with the crowd. ]]

item.title: Twinkies
item.description: [CDATA[ All about the sugary, no substance apps that dominate the app stores. ]]
